item.title: Your Blue Chip, High Street Retailer
item.description:
Your Blue Chip, High Street Retailer

Ligentia has partnered one of the UK’s flagship department-store retailers for 15+ years.  Ligentix is at the heart of their global supply chain solution, enhancing visibility and control through every aspect of procurement, logistics and distribution across multiple categories.

item.title: Constantly adding value..
item.description:
Constantly adding value..

Our award winning, omni-channel, stationary retail customer had a supply chain process which worked well but did not have the necessary visibility to make informed decision making at key milestones in the supply chain process.

item.title: PRODUCT SOURCING
item.description:
PRODUCT SOURCING

With a team of highly experienced sourcing specialists located among the world’s most prominent manufacturing hubs, we have the skills and expertise in the right place to help you where it counts. Product sourcing can be difficult, especially if you are not on the ground, in factories regularly, yet this is commonly a foundation step to the entire business process.

item.title: supply chain visibility
item.description:
supply chain visibility

Keeping a handle on your supply chain can be a time-consuming, complicated affair. But having visibility on your upstream and downstream processes is more important than ever.

item.title: we are BIG on exception management
item.description:
we are BIG on exception management

As you are aware, your supply chain may have many interdependent stages, which need to seamlessly activate to keep things on track. But managing thousands of thousands of orders means relying on suppliers and their processes.

item.title: Product Lifecycle Management
item.description:
Product Lifecycle Management

The process is straightforward and our expert trainers will be on hand to guide you through customising Liantix to your environment and business needs.

item.title: Product & Process Lifecycle Management
item.description:
Product & Process Lifecycle Management

Invariably, product masters are confined to spreadsheets which are cumbersome, limited and difficult to maintain and update.
